mapper.select: SELECT A.WIPER_ID AS WIPER , SUM( CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'in' THEN A.CNT ELSE A.CNT * -1 END ) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT A.WIPER_ID , A.STATUS , SUM(A.COUNT) AS CNT FROM SALE_PRODUCT A INNER JOIN ( SELECT B.ID FROM DAILY_TASK A INNER JOIN DAILY_TASK B ON A.GAS_STATION_ID = B.GAS_STATION_ID AND A.TASK_DATE >= B.TASK_DATE WHERE A.ID = #{taskId} ) B ON A.TASK_ID = B.ID GROUP BY A.WIPER_ID, A.STATUS ) A GROUP BY A.WIPER_ID
SELECT A.WIPER_ID AS WIPER , SUM(A.COUNT) AS COUNT FROM SALE_PRODUCT A RIGHT JOIN DAILY_TASK B ON A.TASK_ID = B.ID WHERE B.ID = #{taskId} AND A.STATUS = #{status} GROUP BY A.WIPER_ID

SELECT A.WIPER_ID AS WIPER , SUM( CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'in' THEN A.CNT ELSE A.CNT * -1 END ) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT B.WIPER_ID , B.STATUS , SUM(B.COUNT) AS CNT FROM DAILY_TASK A INNER JOIN SALE_PRODUCT B ON A.ID = B.TASK_ID WHERE A.GAS_STATION_ID = #{stationId} AND A.TASK_DATE <= IFNULL(#{date}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d')) GROUP BY B.WIPER_ID, B.STATUS ) A GROUP BY A.WIPER_ID
SELECT A.ID FROM DAILY_TASK A INNER JOIN SALE_PRODUCT B ON A.ID = B.TASK_ID WHERE A.GAS_STATION_ID = #{stationId} AND B.STATUS = #{status} ORDER BY B.CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT A.WIPER_ID AS WIPER , SUM(A.COUNT) AS COUNT , MAX(A.TASK_ID) AS TASK_ID FROM SALE_PRODUCT A WHERE A.TASK_ID = #{taskId} AND A.STATUS = #{status} GROUP BY A.WIPER_ID
SELECT A.RN AS RN , DATE_FORMAT(MAX(A.CREATE_DATE), '%H:%i') AS CREATE_DATE FROM sale_product A WHERE A.TASK_ID = #{taskId} AND A.STATUS = 'in' GROUP BY A.RN ORDER BY A.RN

SELECT A.NAME AS NAME , B.COUNT / 2 AS COUNT FROM MEMBER A INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , SUM(B.COUNT) AS COUNT FROM DAILY_TASK A INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.TASK_ID , SUM(A.COUNT) AS COUNT FROM SALE_PRODUCT A WHERE A.STATUS = 'out' GROUP BY A.TASK_ID ) B ON A.ID = B.TASK_ID
WHERE A.TASK_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d')
WHERE A.TASK_DATE >= ADDDATE(CURDATE(), - WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) + 0 ) AND A.TASK_DATE <= ADDDATE(CURDATE(), - WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) + 6 )
WHERE A.TASK_DATE >= LAST_DAY(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) + INTERVAL 1 DAY AND A.TASK_DATE <= LAST_DAY(NOW())
GROUP BY A.MEMBER_ID ) B ON A.ID = B.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY B.COUNT DESC LIMIT 10
